#summary Some famous bugs that might have been found by AddressSanitizer, but were found some other (harder) way instead

= OpenSSL  =

  * [http://heartbleed.com/ Heartbleed] -- A detailed write-up is [http://www.dwheeler.com/essays/heartbleed.html here]. In short, use of a custom freelist hid the bug from testing tools.


= Microsoft Internet Explorer =

  * http://www.kb.cert.org/vuls/id/222929 -- a use-after-free. Little additional information is known except that the bug was exploited in the wild.
